Pm.description: Reference leaf C assimilation during photosynthesis (gCO2/m^2/s)

growthTq.description: Coefficient q on temperature function for plant growth

heatSumT.description: temperature sum for recovery - sum of (25-mean)

coldSumT.description: temperature sum for recovery - sum of means

maxRootFraction.description: Maximum fraction of biomass allocated to roots (0-1)

allocationSeasonF.description: Factor for increasing DM allocation to shoot during reproductive growth (0-1)

useLatitudeFunction.description: Whether DM allocation (shoot/root) will be adjusted using latitude (yes/no)

ReferenceLatitude.description: Reference latitude, beyond which DM allocation is hardly affected (degrees)

paramALatFunction.description: Exponent of function for defining the start of period with high allocation to shoot (>1.0)

onsetFacLatFunction.description: Define the duration of onset phase with high allocation, fraction of main phase (0-1)

outsetFacLatFunction.description: Define the duration of outset phase with high allocation, fraction of main phase (0-1)

maxShoulderLatFunction.description: Maximum duration of the shoulder phases with high DM allocation (days)

minPlateauLatFunction.description: Minimum duration of main phase (plateau) with high DM allocation (days)

paramBLatFunction.description: Exponent of function defining the duration of main phase with high allocation

allocationMax.description: Maximum increase in DM allocation to shoot during reproductive growth (0-1)

paramCLatFunction.description: Exponent of function defining the variations in the increase of DM fraction allocated to shoot (>1.0)

fLeaf.description: Fraction of new shoot growth allocated to leaves

fStolon.description: Fraction of new shoot growth allocated to stolons

SpecificLeafArea.description: Leaf area per dry matter weight (m^2/kgDM)

SpecificRootLength.description: Root length per dry matter weight (m/gDM)

rateLive2Dead.description: Senescence rate for shoot (live to dead material)

rateRootSen.description: Senescence rate for roots (live to soil FOM)

massFluxW0.description: Mass flux scale factor at GLFwater=0.0

stockParameter.description: Parameter for stock influence on senescence

Kappa2_Remob.description: Coefficient for remobilisation of luxury N from tissue 2

Kappa3_Remob.description: Coefficient for remobilisation of luxury N from tissue 3

Kappa4_Remob.description: Coefficient for partitioning non-used Nremob into tissue 4

dmgreenmin.description: Minimum allowable amount for live DM

dmdeadmin.description: Minimum allowable amount for dead DM

initialDMFractions_grass.description: Fractions of initial dmshoot for each biomass pool, for non-legumes(0-1)

initialDMFractions_legume.description: Fractions of initial dmshoot for each biomass pool, for legume species (0-1)

NconcOptimum_leaves.description: Optimum N concentration of leaves (no stress)

NconcMaximum_leaves.description: Maximum N concentration of leaves (luxury uptake)

NconcMinimum_leaves.description: Minimum N concentration of leaves (dead leaves)

RelativeNconc_Stems.description: N concentration for stems, relative to leaves

RelativeNconc_Stolons.description: N concentration for stolons, relative to leaves

RelativeNconc_Roots.description: N concentration for roots, relative to leaves

RelativeNconc_stage2.description: Optimum N concentration for plants at stage 2 (developing), relative to stage1

RelativeNconc_stage3.description: Optimum N concentration for plants at stage 3 (mature), relative to stage1

NMinFix.description: Minimum fraction of N demand fixed by legumes

NMaxFix.description: Maximum fraction of N demand fixed by legumes

NdilutCoeff.description: Coefficient for modifying the effect of N stress on plant growth

waterStressFactor.description: Soil moisture saturation effects on growth

soilSatFactor.description: Soil moisture saturation effects on growth

RootDistributionMethod.description: Method used to compute root ditribution over soil profile

ExpoLinearDepthParam.description: Parameter for ExpoLinear method, fraction of root depth where its proportion starts to decrease (0-1)

ExpoLinearCurveParam.description: Parameter for ExpoLinear method, exponent to determine mass distribution in the soil profile

WaterUptakeSource.description: Whether water uptake is calculated by agpasture or apsim

NUptakeSource.description: Whether N uptake is calculated by agpasture or apsim

PreferenceForGreenDM.description: Weight factor defining the preference level for green DM

PreferenceForDeadDM.description: Weight factor defining the preference level for dead DM

LinearInterpolation.name: HeightMassFN
LinearInterpolation.description: Pair-wise description of the relationship between height and DM
